permafrost.tundra.time

Class TimeZoneHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.time.TimeZoneHelper

  • public final class TimeZoneHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with time zones.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.TimeZone DEFAULT_TIME_ZONE
      The default time zone used by Tundra.
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_HHMM_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified as HH:mm (hours and minutes).
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_RAW_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified in milliseconds.
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_XML_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified as an XML duration string.
      static java.util.TimeZone UTC_TIME_ZONE
      The UTC time zone.

        public static java.util.Calendar convert(java.util.Calendar input,
                                         java.lang.String timezone)
        Converts the given calendar to the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        input - The calendar to be coverted to another time zone.
        timezone - The time zone ID identifying the time zone the calendar will be converted to.
        Returns:
        A new calendar representing the same instant in time as the given calendar but in the given time.

                                         java.lang.String timezone)
        Replaces the time zone on the given calendar with the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        input - The calendar to replace the time zone on.
        timezone - A time zone ID identifying the time zone the calendar will be forced into.
        Returns:
        A new calendar that has been forced into a new time zone.

        Parameters:

      • toIData

        public static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.util.TimeZone timezone,
                                        java.util.Calendar instant)
        Returns an IData representation of the given TimeZone object, using the given datetime to resolve whether daylight savings is active.
        Parameters:
        timezone - The TimeZone object to be converted to an IData representation.
        instant - The datetime used to resolve the status of daylight savings.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the given TimeZone object.

      • toIData

        public static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.util.TimeZone timezone,
                                        java.lang.String datetime,
                                        java.lang.String pattern)
        Returns an IData representation of the given TimeZone object, using the given datetime string to resolve whether daylight savings is active.
        Parameters:
        timezone - The TimeZone object to be converted to an IData representation.
        datetime - The datetime string used to resolve the status of daylight savings.
        pattern - The pattern to use to parse the given datetime string.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the given TimeZone object.

      • toIDataArray

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] toIDataArray(java.util.TimeZone[] timezones,
                                               java.util.Calendar instant)
        Returns an IData representation of the given TimeZone objects, using the given datetime to resolve whether daylight savings is active.
        Parameters:
        timezones - A list of TimeZone objects to be converted to an IData representation.
        instant - The datetime used to resolve the status of daylight savings.
        Returns:
        An IData[] representation of the given TimeZone objects.

      • toIDataArray

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] toIDataArray(java.util.TimeZone[] timezones,
                                               java.lang.String datetime,
                                               java.lang.String pattern)
        Returns an IData representation of the given TimeZone objects, using the given datetime string to resolve whether daylight savings is active.
        Parameters:
        timezones - A list of TimeZone objects to be converted to an IData representation.
        datetime - The datetime string used to resolve the status of daylight savings.
        pattern - The pattern to use to parse the given datetime string.
        Returns:
        An IData[] representation of the given TimeZone objects.
